pages.title: Spell Locate
pages.text: Hold a $(bold)key item$() in your $(bold)offhand$(), then cast $(key)Spell Locate$() at a $(key)Lodestone$() to locate $(bold)structures/biomes$().$(br2)$(welcome/emi#ru)Check uses$() on a $(key)Lodestone$() for recipes, or $(welcome/emi#search)search$() by location name.$(br2)A hit $(key)Lodestone$() has a $(bold)30%$() chance to break.

pages.title: Spell Summon
pages.text: Hold a $(bold)key item$() in your $(bold)offhand$(), then cast $(key)Spell Summon$() at a $(mechanic/spawner)spawner$() to summon special mobs.$(br2)$(welcome/emi#ru)Check uses$() on a $(mechanic/spawner)spawner$() for recipes.$(br2)Some bosses can also be summoned this way, but only where they $(t:e.g. Stalker in the Otherside)$(bold)normally appear$().

pages.title: Remote Manipulation
pages.text: Casting $(key)Remote Manipulation$() releases a spell that $(bold)uses$() your $(bold)offhand$() item on contact.$(br2)Use it to place blocks from a distance.$(br2)It can bypass some restrictions, such as $(mechanic/hostility#arena)Arena$().

pages.title: Remote Destruction
pages.text: Casting $(key)Remote Destruction$() releases a spell that $(bold)breaks$() a block on contact and drops normal loot.$(br2)Use it to break blocks that cannot be mined normally.$(br2)It can bypass some restrictions, such as $(mechanic/hostility#arena)Arena$().
